titleStmt.title: Quakerism no Christianity Clearly and abundantly proved, out of the writings of their chief leaders. With a key, for the understanding their sense of their many usurped, and unintelligible words and phrases, to most readers. In three parts. By John Faldo.
titleStmt.author: Faldo, John, 1633-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Ben. Griffin and are to be sold by Jo. Robinson at the Golden Lyon in St. Pauls Church-yard, and Rob. Boulter at the Turks-head in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Parts two and three each have separate pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Golden Lyon in St. Pauls Church-yard
